title: Scope an Audit of a New Business Acquisition
description: Following a recent acquisition, an internal audit manager plans an audit to review the integration process.

tasks.description: Review the acquisition's due diligence reports to identify key risks noted during the deal.
tasks.expected_outcome: Auditor identifies key risks related to the acquired company's IT systems and cultural integration.

tasks.description: Interview the head of the integration management office (IMO) to understand the integration plan and current status.
tasks.expected_outcome: Auditor gets an overview of the integration timeline and key milestones.

tasks.description: Draft an audit scope that focuses on the highest risk areas of the integration, such as IT systems migration and employee retention.
tasks.expected_outcome: A risk-based audit scope is developed and approved.
